tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.bass_pl: A tablet that raises the power of Sound-type moves. When held by Arceus, it changes to the Sound type.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.binary_: A tablet that raises the power of Digital-type moves. When held by Arceus, it changes to the Digital type.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.blood_g: Boosts the power of the holder's first Blood-type move. Consumed after use.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.blood_m: A disc with Blood-type data. It changes Silvally's type.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.bloodiu: Z-Crystal associated with the Blood-type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Blood-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.cosmic_: Boosts the power of the holder's first Cosmic-type move. Consumed after use.
A disc with Cosmic-type data. It changes Silvally's type.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.cosmium: Z-Crystal associated with the Cosmic-type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Cosmic-type moves to Z-Moves.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.crystal: Boosts the power of the holder's first Crystal-type move. Consumed after use.
A disc with Crystal-type data. It changes Silvally's type.
Z-Crystal associated with the Crystal-type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Crystal-type moves to Z-Moves.

A disc with Digital-type data. It changes Silvally's type.

tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.earmuff: Halves the power of sound-based moves used against the holder.
